q: Indiana Ron Paul Mike Pence is a military and fiscal hawk who frequently plugs his Christian credentials. To some, he's the potential candidate best able to unite two wings of the Republican Party-its fiscal conservatives and social conservatives. He is definitely the guy to watch, says Bryan Fischer of the George Washington Family Association, a group that opposes gay marriage and abortion.
